item.title: Css Protips
item.description: You may wondering how to get the best result of your css code, how to optimize them as well. In this article I will help you to do it as well so keep reading! I recently used this tricks for almost my projects related with front-end development, so this is something new for me. Table Of Contents Use CSS Reset Inherit box-sizing Use all: unset; instead to resetting all element’s properties Apply/Unapply CSS Rules With :not() Checking Font Installed Locally Add line-height to body Set :focus State to These Elements Use CSS Reset This is popular opinion and almost developer out there using this way to enforce the style consistency on different browsers with a clean and slate for styling an elements.
